WorkItem.ClosedComment: Mana calculations for Rawr2/3.Enhance disabled a while ago in relation to this.
WorkItem.Description:
I posted on MMO-Champions, but here it is for the official tracker...basically, I figured out what is making the drastic difference in DPS--it's Rawr's mana calculations option.  For whatever reason, Rawr thinks that I'll OOM more often with the different build than Enhsim does.  The files you will want as a reference are linked below directly to the post I attached them in on mmo-champion.  If you have any questions, let me know.  Thanks.
Â 
It's the post linked here as well as the one after it.  Thanks.
http://www.mmo-champion.com/class-shaman/rawr-enhance-enhancement-shaman-dps-calculator/msg1931992/#msg1931992
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Mana Calculations Difference between Enhsim and Rawr

Comments.Message: Yeah I did ask that you posted it here. However you did do a half hearted job only posting a link.

Your original post was "found a possible glitch or misdetection in Rawr, levaa...basically, I'm testing some various talent builds, since I don't have an issue with mana...so I'm dropping clearcasting and imp SS, giving me 2 extra points...I figure topping of Imp Shields with the extra 2 points would be a bigger benefit, but Rawr says putting 2 into Ancestral Knowledge is better...the 3/5 & 2/3 isn't better, so the threshold for Rawr is actually the 4/5 & 1/3 mark for some reason...I did enhsim on both talent specs (4/5|1/3 & 2/5|3/3) and in enhsim it says that capping shields is about a 30 DPS improvement, whereas Rawr puts my DPS at ~700 DPS improvement with 4/5 AK.  Figured I'd post everything here, so the guru's can take a look Smiley  Not sure which one is off, but I'd be interested in finding out.  Let me know if you need anything else, thanks."
Sorry, but it would not let me attach more than 1 file, so I figured the best thing to do would be to just link directly to my post in MMO-Champion where all 4 files are.
